name: WORLD SOCCER TOURNAMENT 3D
description:
World Soccer Tournament is a real football simulation with 3D graphics and smooth game play.

Choose your team from 32 national teams and win the world tournament.

■Controls:
-Smart joystick control to move player
-Kick control to make a powerful kick
-Pass control to pass the ball to friendly player
-Tackle control to snatch ball from opponent player

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive soccer game.

Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
